original_text: Near the end of the time when those kings rule, the people will be completely wicked. Then a proud, cruel king will appear. He will deceive people.
korean_text: 이 네 나라 마지막 때에 반역자들이 가득할 즈음에 한 왕이 일어나리니 그 얼굴은 뻔뻔하며 속임수에 능하며

sentences.original_text: Near the end of the time
the people will be completely wicked
Then a proud, cruel king will appear
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 교만하고 잔인한 왕이 나타날 것이다
